search_parameters.q: Who is the richest person in the world

source.title: The Top Ten Richest People In The World - Forbes

answers.answer: Bernard Arnault - Who is the richest man in the world? As of April 1, 2023, the richest man in the world is Bernard ArnaultBernard ArnaultBernard Jean Étienne Arnault (French: [bɛʁnaʁ ʒɑ̃ etjɛn aʁno]; born 5 March 1949) is a French business magnate, investor, and art collector. He is the founder, chairman, and chief executive officer of LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton, the world's largest luxury goods company.https://en.wikipedia.org › wiki › Bernard_ArnaultBernard Arnault - Wikipedia, the CEO and chairman of LVMH of France; he's worth nearly $226 billion. He moved into the number one spot after Elon Musk's fortune fell in late 2022 as shares of electric carmaker Tesla fell.1 apr 2023

related_questions.question: Who is the richest person in the world 2023?
related_questions.answer: Forbes Billionaires Index Bernard Arnault (74) has been named the world's richest man of 2023 with an estimated fortune of $211 billion, according to Forbes' 37th annual billionaires list, released Tuesday.
